How many integers are common solutions to these three inequalities? \[
\begin{array}{cccc}
(1) & -3y & \geq & y+7 \\
(2) & -2y & \leq & 12 \\
(3) & -4y & \geq & 2y+17
\end{array}
\]
inference: Final Answer: $\boxed{5}$. I hope it is correct.
